00020 #include "util/DotProgress.h"
00021 //
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 
00025 DotProgress::DotProgress(std::ostream *strm)
00026 {
00027         outstr = strm;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void DotProgress::SetStepProperties(int level, int mx, int inc)
00031 {
00032         verbosity = level;
00033         dotMod = inc;
00034         dotCount = dotMod;
00035 }
00036 
00037 void DotProgress::Step(int level)
00038 {
00039         if (level <= verbosity)
00040         {
00041                 --dotCount;
00042                 if (dotCount <= 0)
00043                 {
00044                         dotCount = dotMod;
00045 
00046                         outstr->put('.');
00047                         outstr->flush();
00048                 }
00049         }
00050 }
